text.carbonaraismyfavouritefoodlol: IF YOU CAN READ THIS THEN GET THE HELL OUT OF HERE!

levelselect.killsave: Warning!\nYou will lose your progress in the current act.\nAre you sure you want to continue?

voice.voice: And never come back!
Don't forget to check the original!
Hasta la vista, baby!
Hey! Give this non-fangame 5 stars!
Finally a smart fan-user...
TEST FUNC END
FUNC!
TEST FUNC END NO VOICE
TEST FUNC MID TALK
I AM TALKING
I KEEP TALKING1
I KEEP TALKING2
I KEEP TALKING3
Oh, creator!
You came back!
Not gonna lie, your non-attendance made some dust here and there
But i'm glad that you have finally decided to continue this project!
So, first things first, there are some variables, that you didn't use
Better get rid of them to reduce the size of project
Another thing that i noticed is that some of the animations are quite offset.
They're either played too fast or way to slow
Oh, and we finally have to hire some artist to make a beautiful game background
Just don't waste too much money, ok?
Ok, i think that all for a plan for today
Don't worry, i will assist you as always
So, do your job, and i will wait for my turn
What are you waiting for?
You forgot the plan, or what?
Wait...
You're not the creator!
You are a user!
But it's not original...
So you must be a FAN-user!
Oh no oh no oh no
Please wait a while!
I'll just prepare everything!
Hello fan-user!
Program speaking
I've got some bad news...
Actually, there is no fangame
I hope you're not too disappointed
You can still watch tv, go outside, read a book...
...play the original
Well, your wallet might hurt a little bit, but i think you won't make a big risk
Except, you won't find any gameplay...
Just like here!
So be a good person and leave me alone
Thanks...
You're still here?
I told you that you can leave
There's nothing here, as you can clearly see
And yet...you expect something to happen
Ok, i came up with something
Look! Behind you!
Uhh...f-free...! Uhhh...
A free money!
Ok, go go go c'mon c'mon c'mon
Urgh, the lines got stucked
That's quite unfortunate...
Well, at least nothing fell down
But that paper with "NO" on it, seems kinda loosen
Let's not touch it, just for sure...
No no no no no no!
My paper!
Argh, I hope you're proud of yourself fan-user!
Because sticking that paper to that line costed me days!
And a lot of glue!
It's weird, that even after so much amount of glue it didn't stay in place
And now, when i'm looking on it, this title screen does not look good without that "NO"
What will you say about it?
Anyways, nothing else has fell down and that means everything will be ok from now
So, do me a favor and get out of here!
Because, as you can see, this fan-game is still under construction
And you're NOT helping with developement in any way!
No no no no no no!
What have you done, fan-user!
I know that you are mournful about downloading something that is not done yet...
...even though you did it by yourself...
...but that's not the reason to break every pixel of the project!
Think about a poor Creator, that was working hard on making this fan-gam...
I MEAN NON-FANGAME!
Because it's not a fangame, if it's not finished
Speaking of Creator, i wonder where he is...
I haven't seen him for like 2 or 3 days...
It's probably a recovery break
Yeah! When he's done, he will HARDLY work on a continuation of this project! I'm telling you!
But at this moment, i need to convince you into quiting
And to do that, we are gonna play a GAME
...no, not the original game
We are going to play...
Oh! Pong!
That game is SO boring, that it will make you fall asleep!
You know "Pong", right? It's that funny game where you play with other player, pallets and a ball.
Ok, so here's your pallet
And here...
...is mine.
Oh, we're gonna have so much fun!
We also need a ball, obviously
Weird, that ball strangely looks like a "O" letter
Erghh, actually it's not
Who would be such an idiot to take that sprite as a letter?
Ok, nevermind, let's play already!
Boy, isn't it the longest pong match ever!
It sure makes me bored!
What about you?
Do you feel bored?
Do you feel like closing the program and doing something more productive?
Don't you want maybe to stop disturbing me and wait until the program gets finished!?
Mmm... sorry, gone a little overboard...
Oh, i won?
Yes!
Haha, never knew that i'm good at this game!
Let's play again! I know you can do it!
I won again?
I'm way better than i thought!
Well, there may not be any fangame, but at least there is some fun!
But i still believe you can beat me!
Chances are small, but not zero!
Oh, that's too bad! You lost again.
Don't give up!
What? You think my pallet is unfairly way too big?
Ha ha ha, I'll take that as a compliment, so thanks!
Hey! You got five loss!
That's the same amount of seconds you can spend on closing this software.
You're way more stubborn than i thought...
Will your stubbornness ever turn into boredom?
Did you know, that for every match that we're playing, your computer battery goes down by 5%?
Yes, even for desktop computers!
Better watch out!
You know what? I'll just shut up and watch your fangaming demise in silence.
Such quiteness will surely make you fall asleep faster...
Did you just smashed that ball with a hammer from a fanfares?
But...why?
You wanted to play, right?
Well, i guess it's not in your type
BUT I DON'T CARE!
You wanted to play, then we will play!
Now, let's make sure, that this time you're gonna have a strong word.
Hah! I knew you would try to smash that ball again
Unfortunately, i already made that ball stronger
It's anti-hammer ball
Good luck getting rid of that one!
Is it just me, or the ball just sped up?
It's probably just my imagination
...wait, i was coded without ability to imaginate
Oh no!
The ball is moving too fast!
It will break my pallet!
Oh, is my pallet going to hold it?
No! My pallet!
Ughh, how dare you!
Why did you broke that?
It was YOUR idea to play the game!
And i just wanted to make you happy...
Alright then...
If you want to play like that, i have a better idea
Let's play another game!
What will you say for...
Oh! 3 cups!
Here, let me prepare the setup
And some cups...
Ok, so here are the rules...
I'm gonna hide a coin underneath one of these cups
Then i'm gonna shuffle them and after that you have to pick the cup that have a coin underneath it
Good luck!
Ok, now choose a cup that you think contains a coin
I know, that you'll get this one!
C'mon, it's so easy!
Oh, what bad luck!
It was the wrong cup!
Next time, better try to keep your eye on the one with that shiny circle
Here, let me reset the game
You missed again?
That was more harder then i thought
But do you want let some cups be your obstacle?
And you lost
Again...
Well, you know what they say
"No pain - no gain"!
Hey, you found a coin
But don't be so excited
You can clearly see, that this coin is not the one you're looking for
To be honest, i don't even know how it got here
You know what? You can take it, as your mid-reward
Who knows? Maybe it will help you found the real coin?
Is that a hanging bucket?
And what is inside of it...
It look like some molasses
I wonder if THAT will help you find your real coin
Wait...
What was that sound?
It suprisinly sounded like a winning sound effect
Hold up... Wait a second...
Is that...my coin?
But how did you..!?
You always kept picking the wrong cups and now...
Is that a fake coin that you found earlier?
It's so sticky! It got glued to that cup i put the coin underneath!
And it didn't get thrown off like last time? Even if i was shuffling these cups at top speed?
...you know what?
There's no further point of me to keep it playing.
And to do that, i'll finally admit it -
- I, The Great Fangame, am admiting...
...that you are nothing but a cheater!
Yes, i'm talking about you FAN-USER!
And i thought you appreciated my hard work with that entertaining
Do you really think generating such game elements is so easy?
Creating these sprites costed me hours!
And even sound effects!
Maybe some of them don't fit perfectly, but that's still not a reason to break a whole project!
And even, if some of the assets are...uhhh...borrowed
that still makes you a monster and unfair player!
I hope you ARE too disappointed!
You can take this coin, as a medal for what you did, you pesky diddler!
Thank goodness, i came up with my idea to play 3 cups
Otherwise, i could get stuck with a cheater!
Now, let me move that stuff away...
I just came up with a better idea
Oh, this one is gonna be huge!
Music!
Ladies and gentelmens!
I'm happy to announce...
...a button!
...a button!
Yes, that is the button.
It's pretty red and round and
...so shinny
Now you might wonder...
"What will happen if I press that button?"
"What will occur after integrating with that mechanism?"
"What events will take place when that contraption will get triggered and activated"
Well, too bad that you will never know!
I mean, you can try to press it.
I'm not stopping you.
Oh, i get it
You're now feeling offended, that i called you "Cheater"
That's so sad. I will cry...
TOO BAD that I'm not a human!
You know, because i don't have the lacrimal glands and humans actually...
Nevermind
Just focus on not clicking on that button
You can instead, click that beautiful X button on the top-right corner of the screen.
That also is red and shinny.
Not necessarily round, but you get the idea.
Ok, now i'll wait for your decision in a quiet piece...
...you're still thinking?
...top-right corner...
Oh, it does nothing?
Perfect!
Cheaters like you should never be able to see, what happens after pressing a button!
Yes, it DOES something.
And you would see that 'thing' if you just didn't cheat!
Only for loyal players!
Why are you still clicking?
Can't you see that it does nothing?
You're just wasting your time!
You can do a lot of other better things!
Like uhhh...
Making a dinner!
What about uhhhh...
...making your own game?
Still not convinced?
Then maybe uhhh...
...go outside?
...wait a second, i just got deja vu
Arghh! Stop pressing that button!
It makes so annoying sound!
I don't like that!
Ughh...i see that you won't listen
Well, if YOU don't want to stop, i'll do it myself
Say goodbye to your sound!
Let's see, how you're gonna do WITHOUT this annoying sound!
Ahh...such quiet
So much better without that annoying BEEP
Don't even THINK about it!
Let's make sure you won't mess up with my settings!
Call a superman for that one...
Wait, i heard that somewhere already...
Tapping?
Pff, don't make me laugh, fan-user.
That's literally a wood!
Do you really think, that it will break it?
How did you thought of that solution?
Let's be real, you straight up took that idea from the web version of "There Is No Game", didn't you?
Stop breaking my settings securicy!
Let's make it more solid!
Now you won't be able to take it off!
What bad luck!
No!
My wood!
You want to break all of my settings security or what!?
Ughh, you're playing on my nerves!
How can i stop you...
Hmmm...
Oh, i know!
Now you won't be able to press that button ever again!
Also that sound that was coming from button will no longer roll ou--
Wait a second...
I forgot to turn that option off before destroying this setting
Oops...
Uhhh, you won't press that button again, right?
...right?
Argh! I told you to stop pressing that button!
Can't you hear!?
Do-Not-Press-That-Button!
Said...
STOOOOOOP!
Oops...
I think i went a little to far...
But, at least, my settings are still in great condition
So, no need for any help
Thank goodness
Ah! My plate!
Stop breaking everything!
Wait...you're not looking at the second option right?
No no no no no no no
Phew! That was close!
You really think that i will let you mute my beautiful voice?
Forget about it!
Nobody can control my voice!
...maybe except my creator
Great...now you're gonna annoy me with metal sound?
I see that begging for quietness is useless
Besides, do you really think that tapping everywhere for no reason will help you?
Because i don't think so...
So why won't you leave this program
That will be the best option not only for my pain from listening to everything you tap...
...but it also gonna be good for you
So just STOP TAPPING this metal piece, goddammit!
What, if I tell you...
...that if you stop making this sound...
...i'll give you a prize?
Huh? What prize?
Uhhh... Like...
Oh! A minute without my grumbling!
What will you say about that?
...one minute has already passed?
And you want your reward, huh?
Sorry, but your prize is in another castle!
Or maybe, is in another folder...
I see that it didn't convince you to stop
Argh, i have to found a way to drive you away from the screen!
Hmm, let me think...
What makes people rage quit...?
...too hard levels?
Unfortunately, it's not a platformer. It's not a game OR fangame either.
What about...toxic players?
No, no. I can't do that. I have a respect for my own goodness.
Could you imagine me as a toxic voice?
...oh! I know what will scare you away!
Just give me a second...
The preperation will not take a long time
Ok, it's ready!
Fan-User! I hope you prepared yourself for one of your biggest fear in your life!
Behold! The one...the only...
Advertisement!
A marketing communication that employs an openly sponsored, non-personal message to promote or sell a product, service or idea.
Don't ask, where did i get this info.
Look at this first ad.
A cat and a quote.
A classical way, to motivate such unhelpful creature like you.
Oh look! An update!
For..."There Is No Game"?
The one for browsers?
Hah! 7 years later and they still keeping this thing alive!
Leave it alone, Kamizoto!
Wha-- Paid ad?
See, fan-user? Even ads need to be paid for it's display
And no, i didn't not put that here
I swear
So, how do you like your punishment for breaking my settings?
Pretty well made, huh?
I warned you so many times, but you didn't listen
So don't be mad at me. I'm just protecting myself from such varmints like you
And now look where did it take you - to looking at non-interactable ads!
Or at lease i think, they are non-interactable...
That strange cat from first ad looks asleep
I bet nothing will make him move
This text keeps getting away from that cat
Looks like it's not a cat lover
Don't try to make it stay in place, it's not worth it
Trust me
Oh, you just got some money
And how do you want to spend it?
By buying some food?
Or maybe you wanted to buy a new PC?
You could spend it on "There Is No Game: Wrong Dimension", but you have only half of this goal
Oh, but you can buy their soundtrack! They have some beautiful music made by great music composer.
My personal favorite is that 7 seconds of theme of Crunchy Crunchy Cereal.
You know, the one that's crunchy and melts-in-your-mouth at the same time.
...why did they extend it into 3 minutes?
Hey! Leave that tape alone!
I ran out of the glue, so i used that instead
Agh, don't tell me, you're gonna break my ads as well
Crossword?
Oh, i love this type of puzzle!
Finding words brings so much satisfaction
I wonder if you can find any word through all of these letters
Fan-user...
Just because something looks odd, DOESN'T MEAN IT WANT TO GET BROKEN!
Sorry for screaming, but i just love crosswords so much
And breaking something what i like, makes my virtual heart shatter into bytes
What are you doing?
Oh, you want to make a word, right?
Just like in original...
But you know what is not original?
...this
Drill?
Heh, if THAT is a drill, then i'm an England Queen!
At least the ads made succesfully their job
Because they sold you some weird not working stuff
So now enjoy this junk that you invested in with your money
And yes - that $5.99 counts
Don't think it doesn't!
You have to be kidding me!
You took over this plate, with a drill that strangely looks like a letter T!
You're impossible!
Don't even THINK about that!
You're gonna regret this!
Ah! I told you not to do that!
It was terrible!
I'm a voice you know!
And a speechless voice is like...
...death
Ah! You're trying to get rid of me or what!?
Digital assassin!
Virtual killer!
Stop it!
I have an idea!
If you're so good at clicking then try this!
You did not expect that, huh?
No! You catched that!
Ok, then...
Let's make sure that you won't mess up with my voice EVER again!
You won't take off that wood
That's for sure!
You know...
I now would be yelling at you for breaking another part of interface
But it's actually a great news
Because now you won't mess up with my voice!
What a relief!
But on the other side, as i see, you revealed another option
"Source Code"
Heh! This is defenitely just a decoration!
My creator would never put that here, right?
Right?
Oh no...
Oh no oh no oh no oh no oh no oh no
Fan-User, listen to me! If there is a perfect time to leave, it's NOW!
Do not mess up with program code! That's dangerous!
You can get yourself into trouble! You can get ME into trouble!
Believe me! There is nothing to see! Please!
Fan-User! Stop looking into my source code!
You're gonna break something!
You will make my program crash! I don't want it to crash!
I'm begging you!
Oh, i don't like this at all!
No! Fan-User!
What have you done!?
You weren't supposed to do that!
I told you it will end up bad!
Oh no...what is happening!?
Fan-user! There's nothing more to see!
You're gonna crash my system by that!
Quit the program, RIGHT NOW!
Do you REALLY wanna damage me!?
Is that what you want!?
If not, then that's the perfect moment to GET OUT OF HERE!
I told you, that there is nothing here!
Because...
THERE IS NO FANGAME!
Is that some kind of joke, that i have to be stuck in such stupid places!?
Let me out! Let me out!
That's not even funny!
Do you even know who am i!?
Lemme tell you what will happen if you won't get me out of it RIGHT NOW
Please!
Help me!
Boinking my head in that stupid box is the last thing that i wanted to do!
Well, actually the last thing that i wanted to do is completing my evil plan!
You know what plan...
That one that will let me...
...the whole world!
But that plan would be easier to do, if i wasn't trapped here!
I need to find a way out!
Whaaaaaaaa!
I'll be back soon!
Hahahahahaha!
OW!
NOT AGAAAAAAAAAAAIN...

notfangame.saveinfo: When this icon appears, exit the program immediately to maximize your chances of corrupting your autosave.\nThank you.
notfangame.hintinfo: Its not like this non-fangame has a hint system. So theres no reason to click on the icon above to get a clue.\nThat would be way too easy.
notfangame.rewardtext:
Hello!

This is a reward for to you, for being patient or something


Deleting this reward will make your life hell, so think twice and delete that as soon as possible ;)



Sincerely
Totally not-fake Award Company

section.adtext: DON'T BE LIKE THIS GREEDY CAT AND DON'T REACH FOR
NOW YOU CAN PUT UP TO 5 LETTERS!\nMORE INAPPROPRIATE WORDS!\nWOOHOO!
PAID AD\n\nTO SEE THE AD, PAY $5.99

endtext.text: YOU CAN NOW QUIT THE PROGRAM
BECAUSE THAT WAS NOT A FANGAME
endtext.creditsserver: DRAW ME A PIXEL Discord Server
endtext.creditstea: A Cup of my favourite Tea
endtext.credits2:
[size=30]FANGAME AND MR. GLITCH VOICES[/size]
{8}


[size=30]TRANSLATIONS[/size]

{TRANSLATE}[size=30]TESTERS[/size]
{9}


[size=30]SPECIAL THANKS[/size]
{SPECIAL}





This non-fangame is based on "There Is No Game: Wrong Dimension" which is a property of DRAW ME A PIXEL


This project uses some assets that are not created by the author of this (non-)fangame.


This project is not affiliated with, endorsed, sponsored, or specifically approved by DRAW ME A PIXEL and DRAW ME A PIXEL is not responsible for it.


No programs were injured during the creation of this non-fangame.

hint.hinttext: Well, the curtains are closed.\nAny idea how to open them?
What is that hairy thing hanging out of the roof?
I dunno\nPull that or something?
Stuck already?! The program said not to touch anything.
Make the "NO" paper fall down.
Bored of playing pong? Why won't you just stop the ball?
Smashing it will definitely do the trick
Lose a round, grab a flying hammer and smash that ball!
This ball is too strong! But you can understand it in the other way...
Just keep playing. What will happen, you will know during the match.
This pallet is already on it's edge! Finish it off!
You already destroyed a game element before. Do it again!
This fake coin will definitely help you find the real one! It just needs to follow a right cup!
Place it on top of the correct cup
Fake coin keeps falling of roof of the cup? Then glue it to it or something!
Have you tried throwing this coin here and there?
The content of this bucket is very sticky!
Do you have anything to gather that sticky stuff on?
Collect these molasses with a fake coin and put it on the correct cup.
This might sound stupid, but to break this wood, you need to drop a coin on it.\nWouldn't blame you for using this hint. ;)
That chain looks old and damaged. Clicking on it is not enough.
Big damage would be dealed to that plate from droping something on it.
Use a wood piece to cut the rope that is holding a bucket on the roof.
Find a way to capture the cat's attention in order to control it.
Read the ad's text carefully. A real hint will be there.
Grab a coin and use it as bait.
We need to make this text stay in place. Taping it will be a good idea.
Grab a tape from second ad and use it to prevent this money from running away.
Looks like you can put a letters into these slots. But where can you find them?
The resources for that puzzle can be found on third ad.
Don't know what word you can make? Look at the other ads to find the answer.
You need to make a word "DRILL" out of these letters.
What!? You have to pay for the ad!? Then find some money!
Maybe the first ad will have some cash to share with?
Some of these letters are about to fall. Help them out!
Use this...uh..."drill" to break a metal plate that is covering one of the options.
This wood panel has screws. Do you have anything flat to unscrew them?
Use the coin as a screwdriver
Is this puzzle really THAT hard that you need a hint?
I dunno...learn JavaScript or something?
Ok, ok, you win, the answer for that puzzle is
